\section{\texttt{proto\_err.errorCount} -- Error Counting}
\label{index:proto-err-errorcount-error-counting}\index{error (class in proto\_err.errorCount)}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{index:proto_err.errorCount.error}\pysiglinewithargsret{\strong{class }\code{proto\_err.errorCount.}\bfcode{error}}{\emph{true}, \emph{emission}, \emph{read}, \emph{readPos}}{}
Information about the errors in a read
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode
\textbf{true: string} :
\begin{quote}

reference base(s)
\end{quote}

\textbf{emission: string} :
\begin{quote}

read base(s)
\end{quote}

\textbf{read: AlignedRead} :
\begin{quote}

pysam AlignedRead object from which error was derived
\end{quote}

\textbf{readPos: int} :
\begin{quote}

position along read where error occured / length of read sequence
\end{quote}

\end{description}\end{quote}


\strong{See also:}
